summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing shipping charges incurred by Jeffrey E. Epstein for various packages sent from his address in New York. The invoice includes multiple entries for different shipments, their respective charges, and discounts applied, totaling $339.39 due by July 31, 2001.
